title: New: 4am – Yearning & Calling
body:
London duo **4am** are keeping their cards close to their chests with regards to information.

With two immaculately produced tracks to their name, the debut, More. and recent offering, _Yearning & Calling_, in stereotypical blog fashion, that’s about as much as they’re giving away. Some sultry vocals, vaguely ominous sounding synths and James Blake-esque beats dominate Yearning & Calling, making for an intoxicating listen. Check it below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
